new_example: Gioco sempre a calcio con gli amici ogni domenica mattina nel parco vicino casa

new_example_english: She plays piano magnificently during evening concerts at music school

new_example_english: We play cards together every Friday evening after dinner to relax

new_example: Voi giocate spesso a tennis o avete abbandonato questo sport da tempo?

new_example_english: I played for three consecutive hours without ever getting tired during the game

new_example_english: He played the best concert of his career in front of an international audience

new_example_english: We played in the rain until the end of the important game

new_example: Avete giocato abbastanza con i bambini o volete continuare ancora un po'?
new_example_english: Did you play enough with the children or do you want to continue a bit more?

new_example: Hanno giocato insieme per l'ultima volta prima che lui si trasferisse
new_example_english: They played together for the last time before he moved away

new_example_english: I always watch the evening news to stay informed about world events

new_example_english: She carefully looks at every detail when visiting contemporary art museums

new_example_english: They always watch their children play in the park with pride and tenderness

new_example_english: I will watch the entire film festival that will be held in our city

new_example_english: He watched his daughter take her first steps with tears in his eyes

new_example_english: We watched sunrise from the mountain during our morning hike

new_example_english: They looked at wedding photos for hours remembering that special day
